dict.acceptation: 过去的，以前的；结束的；前任的；
过去，过往；往事；[语]过去时；

sent.orig: Some ran past, some walked past and a few wheeled past.
sent.trans: 有的人跑着经过，有的人走着经过，还有一些人坐着轮椅经过。

sent.orig: Former past. As early as in the past. Not to the past.
sent.trans: 从前的从前。早以过去。以不是往事了。

sent.orig: Who knows Past Tense and the Past Participle form of this verb?
sent.trans: 谁晓得一般已往时和这个静词的功往总词？

sent.orig: We are proud of the glory the past and sigh the humiliations of the past.
sent.trans: 我们为昔日的辉煌而自豪，也为昔日的屈辱而叹息。

sent.orig: In the past it past the bar, you say?
sent.trans: 以前的就让它过去吧，你说呢？
